noblePhantasms.name: Phoebus Catastrophe
noblePhantasms.detail: Deal heavy damage to all enemies ▲ + gain C. Stars▲ <effect increases with Overcharge>

comments.comment:
A famous female hunter from Greek mythology.
Famous for being the first to land a shot during the Calydonian Boar hunt.
She was also a member of the Argonauts, a group which housed every hero in Greece.

Height/Weight: 166cm, 57kg
Source: Greek Mythology
Region: Greece
Alignment: Neutral-Evil
Gender: Female
Her favorite foods are apples and meat.

Atalante was born as the daughter of a certain country's king, but her father ostracized her because he wanted a baby boy.
Eventually, he abandoned her in the forest.
The goddess Artemis took pity on her, and had a female bear give the girl milk and nurture her.

Once grown, Atalante became an unparalleled hunter, and accomplished many things, such as the Calydonian Boar hunt and joining the Argonautai.
Many came seeking her hand, and the troubled Atalante decided to settle things by holding a foot race.

Atalante never lost a race, but when a man used a goddess' help he was able to force her to wed him.
It is said they were both turned into lions as punishment, but that is not certain.

The bow she currently wields (Tauropolos) is her favorite, as it received a blessing from the goddess Artemis.
By praying to Artemis and the Sun God Apollo, she can fire a powerful anti-army Noble Phantasm called "Phoebus Catastrophe."

Her long-time wish is to "save all the children" which is part of her Master's mission, so she will happily assist them.
You should try to use an apple pie to get on her good side every so often.

voiceLines.name: Birthday
voiceLines.subtitle: Is this not the day thou was born? Praise be to the heavens.

voiceLines.name: During an Event
voiceLines.subtitle: Seems something is going on. Shall we look?

voiceLines.name: Conversation 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Your pace has slowed. What is it?

voiceLines.name: Conversation 2
voiceLines.subtitle: I need you to move swifter than me, Master.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Our bond? Thou must try me and I must measure thee. That is all.

voiceLines.name: Likes
voiceLines.subtitle: I am fond of children. Their smiles bring joy.

voiceLines.name: Dislikes
voiceLines.subtitle: I despise those who abuse children. I pray thou does no such thing.

voiceLines.name: About the Holy Grail
voiceLines.subtitle:
I have but one wish to ask of the Holy Grail.
Bring happiness to all children...

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Master, I am a bowman, so you must not count on me for protection.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Do you care for boar, Master? I've hunted one but am not fond of it.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 3
voiceLines.subtitle: I received no love as a child and bore none of the blessings of childhood. I have no regrets, but I do feel saddened by it.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 4
voiceLines.subtitle: Master, will thou laugh at my request? I would be pleased if you did not...

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 5
voiceLines.subtitle: Watch thy hands. I have taken a vow of purity. No means no...

voiceLines.name: Conversation 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
That Ruler...I don't like her.
But I know she'll never change her ways, and neither will I. I guess we're pretty similar in that sense...ugh.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 5
voiceLines.subtitle: Jack the Ripper...she's here? I see. I'm glad she's doing well. But then again, Chaldea isn't an appropriate place for a small child like her...

voiceLines.name: Conversation 6
voiceLines.subtitle:
Calm down, Penthesilea. I don't think Achilles had any ill intent.
What? That's even worse, you say?
Yeah...I suppose...you're right...

voiceLines.name: Conversation 7
voiceLines.subtitle:
The fleet-footed boy, huh? Well, I don't think we'll be killing each other this time around.
I'm counting on those fast feet of yours.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 8
voiceLines.subtitle:
Chiron... His lectures never end.
Sorry, but I do have my pride, you know? Don't you think shooting an arrow WITH another arrow is kind of...ridiculous!? Next time, I'll show you I can do it too!

voiceLines.name: Level up
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 200500_0_G010]This is merely the beginning.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 2
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 200500_0_G020]Good, I've gotten stronger.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 1
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 200500_0_G030]Thank you for thy blessings, oh goddess.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 3
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 200500_0_G040]This is my true self.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 4
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 200500_0_G050]This is it. My thanks, Master.

voiceLines.name: Summon
text: Art thou my Master? Best Regards.
voiceLines.subtitle: Art thou my Master? Best Regards.

voiceLines.name: Attack 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Hnnh!

voiceLines.name: Attack 2
voiceLines.subtitle: There!

voiceLines.name: Attack 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Raah!

voiceLines.name: Extra Attack
voiceLines.subtitle: Take this!

voiceLines.name: Skill 1
voiceLines.subtitle: This will do.

voiceLines.name: Skill 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Now then.

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 1
voiceLines.subtitle: My prey never escapes.

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Target confirmed... Unleash the final blow!

voiceLines.name: Victory 1
voiceLines.subtitle: There is nothing my arrows can't take down.

voiceLines.name: Victory 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Hmph. You'll never keep up at that pace.

voiceLines.name: Damage 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Gghh!

voiceLines.name: Damage 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Why you!

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Alas...

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 2
voiceLines.subtitle: I've failed you...

voiceLines.name: Command Card 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Yes.

voiceLines.name: Command Card 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Understood.

voiceLines.name: Command Card 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Good.

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm Card
voiceLines.subtitle: Good. The hunt begins!

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 200500_0_B050]To the twin gods I offer this...
[id 200500_0_B051]Phoebus Catastrophe!
